thread.title: Video: Nana Konadu grooves to Ofori Amponsah’s ‘Alewa’
thread.title_full: Video: Nana Konadu grooves to Ofori Amponsah’s ‘Alewa’

title: Video: Nana Konadu grooves to Ofori Amponsah’s ‘Alewa’
text:
Source: Ghana | Myjoyonline.com | Ernest Dela Aglanu (Twitter: @delaXdela / Instagram: citizendela) Date: 20-10-2015 Time: 10:10:39:am 
Former First Lady Nana Kondu Agyeman Rawlings has fallen in love with Pastor Ofori Amponsah’s latest song, ‘Alewa’ which features Sarkodie. 
In the midst of heated controversies as to whether it was a right move for Pastor Ofori Amponsah to return to highlife music, the Former First Lady appears to be oblivious of the controversy and put on her dancing shoes when the song was played. 
Capping her very engaging interview on the Super Morning Show on Joy FM with Nhyira Addo Tuesday, she requested any nice song from Sarkodie. 
Nhyira Addo reached out for Ofori Amponsah's ‘Alewa’ featuring Sarkodie. The song instantly ignited the Former First Lady’s dancing prowess. 
Watch Nana Konadu’s irresistible dance moves:
